        Parameters:
        theTitle - The title of the new book
        theAuthor - the author of the new book
        theISBN - the ISBN of the new book, a 10 digits or 13 digits long number
        thePrice - the price of the new book, larger than or equal to 0

        Find all the books cheaper than a given price.
        Parameters:
        inventory - An array of Books
        price - Return all the books with the price below this value
